verses.verse: Wherefore <WG3767> laying aside <WG659> <WG5642> all <WG3956> malice <WG2549>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> guile <WG1388>, and <WG2532> hypocrisies <WG5272>, and <WG2532> envies <WG5355>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> evil speakings <WG2636>,
As <WG5613> newborn <WG738> babes <WG1025>, desire <WG1971> <WG5657> the sincere <WG97> milk <WG1051> of the word <WG3050>, that <WG2443> ye may grow <WG837> <WG5686> thereby <WG1722> <WG846>:
If so be <WG1512> ye have tasted <WG1089> <WG5662> that <WG3754> the YY <WG2962> is gracious <WG5543>.

To <WG4314> whom <WG3739> coming <WG4334> <WG5740>, as unto a living <WG2198> <WG5723> stone <WG3037>, disallowed <WG593> <WG5772> indeed <WG3303> of <WG5259> men <WG444>, but <WG1161> chosen <WG1588> of <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and precious <WG1784>,

Ye <WG846> also <WG2532>, as <WG5613> lively <WG2198> <WG5723> stones <WG3037>, are built up <WG3618> <WG5743> a spiritual <WG4152> house <WG3624>, an holy <WG40> Kohenhood <WG2406>, to offer up <WG399> <WG5658> spiritual <WG4152> sacrifices <WG2378>, acceptable <WG2144> to 'Elohim <WG2316> by <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.

Wherefore <WG1352> also <WG2532> it is contained <WG4023> <WG5719> in <WG1722> the scripture <WG1124>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I lay <WG5087> <WG5719> in <WG1722> Sion <WG4622> a chief corner <WG204> stone <WG3037>, elect <WG1588>, precious <WG1784>: and <WG2532> he that believeth <WG4100> <WG5723> on <WG1909> him <WG846> shall <WG2617> not be <WG3364> confounded <WG2617> <WG5686>.

Unto you <WG5213> therefore <WG3767> which <WG3588> believe <WG4100> <WG5723> he is precious <WG5092>: but <WG1161> unto them which be dis`Ovedient <WG544> <WG5723>, the stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> <WG5723> disallowed <WG593> <WG5656>, the same <WG3778> is made <WG1096> <WG5675> <WG1519> the head <WG2776> of the corner <WG1137>,

And <WG2532> a stone <WG3037> of stumbling <WG4348>, and <WG2532> a rock <WG4073> of offence <WG4625>, even to them which <WG3739> stumble <WG4350> <WG5719> at the word <WG3056>, being dis`Ovedient <WG544> <WG5723>: whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> also <WG2532> they were appointed <WG5087> <WG5681>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> are a chosen <WG1588> generation <WG1085>, a royal <WG934> Kohenhood <WG2406>, an holy <WG40> nation <WG1484>, a peculiar <WG1519> <WG4047> people <WG2992>; that <WG3704> ye should shew forth <WG1804> <WG5661> the praises <WG703> of him who hath called <WG2564> <WG5660> you <WG5209> out of <WG1537> darkness <WG4655> into <WG1519> his <WG846> marvellous <WG2298> light <WG5457>:

Which <WG3588> in time past <WG4218> were not <WG3756> a people <WG2992>, but <WG1161> are now <WG3568> the people <WG2992> of 'Elohim <WG2316>: which <WG3588> had <WG1653> not <WG3756> obtained mercy <WG1653> <WG5772>, but <WG1161> now <WG3568> have obtained mercy <WG1653> <WG5685>.

Dearly beloved <WG27>, I beseech <WG3870> <WG5719> you as <WG5613> strangers <WG3941> and <WG2532> pilgrims <WG3927>, abstain from <WG567> <WG5733> fleshly <WG4559> lusts <WG1939>, which <WG3748> war <WG4754> <WG5731> against <WG2596> the soul <WG5590>;

Having <WG2192> <WG5723> your <WG5216> conversation <WG391> honest <WG2570> among <WG1722> the goyim <WG1484>: that <WG2443>, whereas <WG1722> <WG3739> they speak against <WG2635> <WG5719> you <WG5216> as <WG5613> evildoers <WG2555>, they may <WG1392> by <WG1537> your good <WG2570> works <WG2041>, which they shall behold <WG2029> <WG5660>, glorify <WG1392> <WG5661> 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of visitation <WG1984>.

<WG3767> Submit yourselves <WG5293> <WG5649> to every <WG3956> ordinance <WG2937> of man <WG442> for <WG1223> the YY's sake <WG2962>: whether it be <WG1535> to the king <WG935>, as <WG5613> supreme <WG5242> <WG5723>;

Or <WG1535> unto governors <WG2232>, as <WG5613> unto them that are sent <WG3992> <WG5746> by <WG1223> him <WG846> for <WG1519> <WG3303> the punishment <WG1557> of evildoers <WG2555>, and <WG1161> for the praise <WG1868> of them that do well <WG17>.

For <WG3754> so <WG3779> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, that with well doing <WG15> <WG5723> ye may put to silence <WG5392> <WG5721> the ignorance <WG56> of foolish <WG878> men <WG444>:

As <WG5613> free <WG1658>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> using <WG2192> <WG5723> your liberty <WG1657> for <WG5613> a cloke <WG1942> of maliciousness <WG2549>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> the servants <WG1401> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
Honour <WG5091> <WG5657> all <WG3956> men. Love <WG25> <WG5720> the brotherhood <WG81>. Fear <WG5399> <WG5737> 'Elohim <WG2316>. Honour <WG5091> <WG5720> the king <WG935>.

Servants <WG3610>, be subject <WG5293> <WG5746> to your masters <WG1203> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> fear <WG5401>; not <WG3756> only <WG3440> to the good <WG18> and <WG2532> gentle <WG1933>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> to the froward <WG4646>.

For <WG1063> this <WG5124> is thankworthy <WG5485>, if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> for <WG1223> conscience <WG4893> toward 'Elohim <WG2316> endure <WG5297> <WG5719> grief <WG3077>, suffering <WG3958> <WG5723> wrongfully <WG95>.

For <WG1063> what <WG4169> glory <WG2811> is it, if <WG1487>, when <WG2532> ye be buffeted <WG2852> <WG5746> for your faults <WG264> <WG5723>, ye shall take it patiently <WG5278> <WG5692>? but <WG235> if <WG1487>, when ye do well <WG15> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> suffer <WG3958> <WG5723> for it, ye take it patiently <WG5278> <WG5692>, this <WG5124> is acceptable <WG5485> with <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> even <WG1519> hereunto <WG5124> were ye called <WG2564> <WG5681>: because <WG3754> Moshiach <WG5547> also <WG2532> suffered <WG3958> <WG5627> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>, leaving <WG5277> <WG5723> us <WG2254> an example <WG5261>, that <WG2443> ye should follow <WG1872> <WG5661> his <WG846> steps <WG2487>:
Who <WG3739> did <WG4160> <WG5656> no <WG3756> sin <WG266>, neither <WG3761> was guile <WG1388> found <WG2147> <WG5681> in <WG1722> his <WG846> mouth <WG4750>:

Who <WG3739>, when he was reviled <WG3058> <WG5746>, reviled <WG486> not <WG3756> again <WG486> <WG5707>; when he suffered <WG3958> <WG5723>, he threatened <WG546> <WG5707> not <WG3756>; but <WG1161> committed <WG3860> <WG5707> himself to him that judgeth <WG2919> <WG5723> righteously <WG1346>:

Who <WG3739> his own self <WG846> bare <WG399> <WG5656> our <WG2257> sins <WG266> in <WG1722> his own <WG846> body <WG4983> on <WG1909> the tree <WG3586>, that <WG2443> we <WG2198>, being dead <WG581> <WG5637> to sins <WG266>, should live <WG2198> <WG5661> unto righteousness <WG1343>: by <WG3739> whose <WG846> stripes <WG3468> ye were healed <WG2390> <WG5681>.

For <WG1063> ye were <WG2258> <WG5713> as <WG5613> sheep <WG4263> going astray <WG4105> <WG5746>; but <WG235> are <WG1994> now <WG3568> returned <WG1994> <WG5648> unto <WG1909> the Shepherd <WG4166> and <WG2532> Bishop <WG1985> of your <WG5216> souls <WG5590>.
